name: Lunadroid 237 - A VR Short Story
description:
Lunadroid 237 is a short interactive narrative designed in Unity for the Oculus Rift DK2. Lunadroid takes place on The Moon on July 21, 1969. Part game, part short film, it is inspired by exploration games like Myst and Dear Esther as well as sci-fi films set in space like 2001 A Space Odyssey and Moon. Best enjoyed with headphones.

Original Soundtrack by Aaron Lemke also available for download.

The experience and soundtrack are available free of charge, but feel free to toss a little donation my way if your feelin' it : )
